SEARCH
Package polimi.ingsw.networking.rmi

Class RMIClient

java.lang.Object
polimi.ingsw.networking.rmi.RMIClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
CommonClientActions
public class RMIClient extends Object implements CommonClientActions
RMIClient Class
Handle all the network communications between RMIClient and RMIServer
From the first connection, to the creation, joining, leaving, grabbing and positioning messages through the network
by the RMI Network Protocol
